parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-m | Noun - masculine singular construct
str2: A staff, rod, shaft, branch, a tribe
Gad -- a son of Jacob, also his tribe and its territory, also a prophet
Untranslatable mark of the accusative case
Ramoth -- 'heights', the name of several cities in Israel

parse: Preposition-b, Article | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Gilead -- a region in Palestine, also the name of several Israelites
Mahanaim -- 'two camps', a place East of the Jordan
